item.description:
So being Massachusetts we have way more candlepin than duckpin, so let's try some "big ball" bowling as I referred to it as a child.

On Saturdays this venue has one deal from 5-9 and then Cosmic bowling starts at 9. Looks like there is some pub grub as well so this sounds like a good evening.

1st deal is bowling, shoes and a pitcher of coke for up to 6 people for $64.99 or $11 each. Sounds pretty good to me.

At 9:00 venue changes over to Cosmic bowling with funky lights and music etc. Will update pricing on that as it is not on the website.

Â 

http://www.bowlbrunswick.com/about-us/226/
item.name: Go Bowling....
